Interface BranchingRepository

  • Method Details

    • deleteBranchingByIds

      @Modifying @Query(value="DELETE FROM qds_branching WHERE id = ANY(:branchingIds)", nativeQuery=true) void deleteBranchingByIds(@Param("branchingIds") Integer[] branchingIds)

    • getBranchingIdsForScenario

      @Query(value="SELECT id FROM qds_branching WHERE scenario_id=:scenarioId", nativeQuery=true) List<Integer> getBranchingIdsForScenario(@Param("scenarioId") Integer scenarioId)

    • getBranchingsByIds

      @Query(value="WITH\n event_types AS (SELECT unnest(ARRAY[\'FORK_IN\', \'JOIN_IN\', \'FORK_OUT\', \'JOIN_OUT\']) AS type),\n branching_events AS (\n SELECT\n e.branching_id,\n e.thread_id,\n e.event_type,\n COALESCE(array_agg(qto.object_id ORDER BY qto.object_id)\n FILTER (WHERE qto.object_id IS NOT NULL),\'{}\') as thread_objects\n FROM qds_event e\n LEFT JOIN qds_thread_to_object qto ON qto.thread_id = e.thread_id\n JOIN event_types et ON et.type = e.event_type\n WHERE e.branching_id = ANY(:branchingIds)\n GROUP BY e.branching_id, e.thread_id, e.event_type\n )\nSELECT\n b.id,\n b.branching_type,\n b.is_correct,\n b.title,\n b.description,\n b.branching_time,\n be.thread_id,\n be.event_type,\n be.thread_objects\nFROM qds_branching b\n LEFT JOIN branching_events be ON be.branching_id = b.id\nWHERE b.id = ANY(:branchingIds)\n", nativeQuery=true) List<InternalBranchingRow> getBranchingsByIds(@Param("branchingIds") Integer[] branchingIds)

    • getFirstForkId

      @Query(value=" WITH RECURSIVE flow_trace AS (\n SELECT\n e.id,\n e.event_type,\n e.branching_id,\n e.thread_id\n FROM qds_event e\n WHERE e.thread_id = :threadId\n AND e.event_type IN (\'FORK_IN\', \'JOIN_IN\')\n\n UNION ALL\n\n -- dla ka\u017cdego JOIN_IN znajd\u017a nast\u0119pny event ko\u0144cowy\n SELECT\n e2.id,\n e2.event_type,\n e2.branching_id,\n e2.thread_id\n FROM flow_trace ft\n -- znajd\u017a JOIN_OUT o tym samym branching_id\n JOIN qds_event e1 ON e1.branching_id = ft.branching_id\n AND e1.event_type = \'JOIN_OUT\'\n -- w w\u0105tku tego JOIN_OUT znajd\u017a event ko\u0144cowy\n JOIN qds_event e2 ON e2.thread_id = e1.thread_id\n AND e2.event_type IN (\'FORK_IN\', \'JOIN_IN\')\n WHERE ft.event_type = \'JOIN_IN\'\n )\n SELECT branching_id\n FROM flow_trace\n WHERE event_type = \'FORK_IN\'\n LIMIT 1\n", nativeQuery=true) Integer getFirstForkId(Integer threadId)
